full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Electrical Work on CCGS Des Groseilliers

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3646314643
* **Request for Proposal**: F3065-221678-B - Electrical Work on the CCGS Des Groseilliers
* **Publication Date**: October 7, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: Deadline: October 26, 2022, 14:00 HAE (Eastern Daylight Time)

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: There are no regions of opportunity.

## Procurement Scope

Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard, is inviting interested suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of Electrical Work on the CCGS Des Groseilliers. The scope of work includes:

* Design, manufacture, and installation of a shore power supply panel with phase selection
* Engineering and installation of infrared windows for thermographic readings

## Tender Requirements

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the tender closing date mentioned above.
* Failure to submit bids prior to the tender closing date and time may result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Gabriel Piras
* **Contact Email**: gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14306618?extsite=MTQzMDY2MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14306618?extsite=MTQzMDY2MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
